title: Creative Inspire 7.1 T7700 hátalarakerfi til sölu
text:
Til sölu 3 ára gamalt Creative Inspire 7.1 T7700 hátalarakerfi. Nýtt svona kerfi kostar 16.900 kr. í Tölvulistanum. Þetta kerfi er í fínu lagi og fæst fyrir 8000 krónur.
Frábært hljómur í þessu hátalarakerfi, geggjað í leikina og kvikmyndirnar.
Lýsing:
Creative Multi-Speaker System (CMSS) technology - dramatically enhances the playback of 5.1 and 6.1 audio soundtracks, as well as stereo music files, across the full 7.1 speaker configuration
2-way speaker design - The three front satellite speakers each feature a tweeter and a midrange driver for smooth and accurate high frequency response and clear, balanced sound in games, movies, and music
Unique M-PORT to directly stream music from compatible Creative NOMAD MuVo MP3 players
Powerful wooden subwoofer, with a 6.5” long-throw driver and a dual flared port tube, for powerful and rock solid bass
92 Watts Total RMS / 125 Watts System Power
Front and Rear Satellite Speakers: (Measured @ 10% THD @ 1kHz, one channel driven) 8 Watts RMS per speaker (x 6 speakers)
Center Satellite Speaker: (Measured @ 10% THD @ 1kHz, one channel driven) 20 Watts RMS
Subwoofer: (Measured @ 10% THD @ 1kHz) 24 Watts RMS
Signal-to-Noise-Ratio: 80 dB
Overall Frequency Response: 40Hz to 20kHz
Volume/bass controls
Stereo line-in
Headphone jack
Bætt við 8. september 2008 -  21:50
Kerfið er SELT
